00026 simsignal_t Buffer::txPkSignal = SIMSIGNAL_NULL;
00027 simsignal_t Buffer::latencySignal = SIMSIGNAL_NULL;

00029 Buffer::~Buffer(){
00030     destinationGates.clear();
00031     receiveCallbacks.clear();
00032     transmitCallbacks.clear();
00033 }

00035 int Buffer::numInitStages() const
00036 {
00037     return 1;

00040 void Buffer::initialize(int stage)
00041 {
00042     if(stage==0){
00043         ev << "Initialize Buffer" << endl;
00044         initializeStatistics();
00045     }
00046 }
00047 
00048 void Buffer::initializeStatistics()
00049 {
00050     txPkSignal = registerSignal("txPk");
00051     latencySignal = registerSignal("latency");
00052 }
00053 
00054 void Buffer::recordPacketSent()
00055 {
00056     emit(txPkSignal, 1L);
00057 }

00059 void Buffer::setIsEmpty(bool empty)
00060 {
00061     if(ev.isGUI()){
00062         if (empty)
00063         {
00064             getDisplayString().setTagArg("i", 1, "black");
00065             getDisplayString().setTagArg("tt", 0, "Buffer is empty");
00066         }
00067         else
00068         {
00069             getDisplayString().setTagArg("i", 1, "");
00070             getDisplayString().setTagArg("tt", 0, "");
00071         }
00072     }
00073 }

00075 void Buffer::addReceiveCallback(Callback *cb, TTEApplicationBase *application)
00076 {
00077     receiveCallbacks[application]=cb;
00078 }
00079 
00080 Callback* Buffer::getReceiveCallback(TTEApplicationBase *application)
00081 {
00082     if(receiveCallbacks.find(application) == receiveCallbacks.end())
00083         return NULL;
00084     return receiveCallbacks[application];
00085 }
00086 
00087 void Buffer::addTransmitCallback(Callback *cb, TTEApplicationBase *application)
00088 {
00089     transmitCallbacks[application]=cb;
00090 }
00091 
00092 Callback* Buffer::getTransmitCallback(TTEApplicationBase *application)
00093 {
00094     if(transmitCallbacks.find(application) == transmitCallbacks.end())
00095         return NULL;
00096     return transmitCallbacks[application];
00097 }

00099 EtherFrame* Buffer::getFrame(){
00100     return dequeue();
00101 }
00102 
00103  void Buffer::putFrame(EtherFrame* frame){
00104     enqueue(frame);
00105 }
00106 
00107 void Buffer::handleMessage(cMessage *msg)
00108 {
00109     if (msg->arrivedOn("in"))
00110     {
00111         EtherFrame *frame = check_and_cast<EtherFrame *>(msg);
00112         emit(latencySignal, simTime()-msg->getCreationTime());
00113         putFrame((EtherFrame*) frame);
00114         // Now execute callbacks if there are some
00115         for(std::map<TTEApplicationBase*,Callback*>::const_iterator iter = receiveCallbacks.begin();
00116                 iter != receiveCallbacks.end(); ++iter){
00117             iter->first->executeCallback(iter->second);
00118         }
00119     }
00120 }
00121 
00122 void Buffer::handleParameterChange(const char* parname){
00123     destinationGates.clear();
00124     if(ev.isGUI()){
00125         //TODO check why this does not work
00126         //getDisplayString().setTagArg("i2", 0, "");
00127         //getDisplayString().setTagArg("tt", 0, "");
00128     }
00129     std::string destinationGatesString = par("destination_gates").stdstringValue();
00130     std::vector<std::string> destinationGatePaths;
00131     split(destinationGatesString,',',destinationGatePaths);
00132     for(std::vector<std::string>::iterator destinationGatePath = destinationGatePaths.begin();
00133             destinationGatePath!=destinationGatePaths.end();destinationGatePath++){
00134         cGate* gate = gateByFullPath((*destinationGatePath));
00135         if(gate){
00136             destinationGates.push_back(gate);
00137         }
00138         else{
00139             if(ev.isGUI()){
00140                 ev<<"Configuration problem: Gate "<<(*destinationGatePath)<<" could not be resolved!"<<endl;
00141                 getDisplayString().setTagArg("i2", 0, "status/excl3");
00142                 getDisplayString().setTagArg("tt", 0, "WARNING: Configuration Problem outgoing gate!");
00143             }
00144         }
00145     }
00146 }
